text:
Hi all!
I am currently developing a blog template, and have a major doubt.
If for a blog, one uses different templates for blog listing and blog post view, does it hamper the performance or the analytics of the blog in any way ?
Is it a bad practice to develop two templates for the above mentioned purposes and package them together as blog template design for the marketplace ?
Doesn't hurt. Nearly every single template will handle it this way. Its even suggested by HubSpot when you take a look at the correspondign settings (those are different use cases at all).
Thanks for the replies!  It seems we are going to need to create a custom process using HubSpot API.
Cant you just not import it into the one you dont need it for?
